subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Dogfighting, videotaping, drug use, bullying and texting are among the misdeeds that have drawn penalties from the N.F.L., punishments that have seemed inconsistent and arbitrary to some.
snippet: Dogfighting, videotaping, drug use, bullying and texting are among the misdeeds that have drawn penalties from the N.F.L., punishments that have seemed inconsistent and arbitrary to some.
